mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pet_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'ACTIVE' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_info ( user_id, pet_name, pet_type, stage, status, fullness, intimacy, exp, cleanliness, stress, energy, is_sleeping, created_at, last_fed_at, last_played_at, last_cleaned_at, last_slept_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{petName}, #{petType}, #{stage}, 'ACTIVE', #{fullness}, #{intimacy}, #{exp}, 100, 0, 100, false, NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE pet_info SET fullness = #{fullness}, intimacy = #{intimacy}, exp = #{exp}, cleanliness = #{cleanliness}, stress = #{stress}, energy = #{energy}, is_sleeping = #{isSleeping}, stage = #{stage}, status = #{status}, pet_type = #{petType}, pet_name = #{petName}, equipped_items = #{equippedItems}, last_fed_at = #{lastFedAt}, last_played_at = #{lastPlayedAt}, last_cleaned_at = #{lastCleanedAt}, last_slept_at = #{lastSleptAt} WHERE pet_id = #{petId}
mapper.select: SELECT required_exp FROM pet_growth_rule WHERE stage = #{stage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_diary (pet_id, date, content, mood, created_at) VALUES (#{petId}, #{date}, #{content}, #{mood}, NOW())
